alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 3:26PM CDT until May 28 at 3:34PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Perdido River Near Barrineau Park affecting Baldwin and Escambia Counties. For the Perdido River...including Barrineau Park...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Perdido River Near Barrineau Park. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, River begins to leave its banks at the parking lot of Adventures Perdido River. Begins to threaten several permanently parked travel trailers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage later this afternoon and will continue rising to a crest of 15.7 feet by Friday morning. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
